00054   class ConnectionManager : public DispatchHandler {
00055 
00056   public:
00057 
00058     class ConnectionState : public ReferenceCount {
00059     public:
00060       bool                connected;
00061       struct sockaddr_in  addr;
00062       struct sockaddr_in  local_addr;
00063       time_t              timeout;
00064       DispatchHandlerPtr  handler;
00065       boost::mutex        mutex;
00066       boost::condition    cond;
00067       boost::xtime        next_retry;
00068       std::string         service_name;
00069     };
00070     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ConnectionState> ConnectionStatePtr;
00071 
00072 
00073     struct LtConnectionState {
00074       bool operator()(const ConnectionStatePtr &cs1,
00075                       const ConnectionStatePtr &cs2) const {
00076         return xtime_cmp(cs1->next_retry, cs2->next_retry) >= 0;
00077       }
00078     };
00079 
00080     struct SharedImpl {
00081       Comm              *comm;
00082       boost::mutex       mutex;
00083       boost::condition   retry_cond;
00084       boost::thread     *thread;
00085       SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>  conn_map;
00086       std::priority_queue<ConnectionStatePtr, std::vector<ConnectionStatePtr>,
00087           LtConnectionState> retry_queue;
00088       bool quiet_mode;
00089     };
00090 
00096     ConnectionManager(Comm *comm = 0) {
00097       m_impl = new SharedImpl;
00098       m_impl->comm = comm ? comm : Comm::instance();
00099       m_impl->thread = new boost::thread(*this);
00100       m_impl->quiet_mode = false;
00101     }
00102 
00106     ConnectionManager(const ConnectionManager &cm) {
00107       m_impl = cm.m_impl;
00108       intrusive_ptr_add_ref(this);
00109     }
00110

00115       return;
00116     }
